data.title: Fëonir’s Workshop
data.description: Another <abbr title="Dungeons & Dragons">D&D</abbr>-related labour of love, this time a general site for all things D&D, including the draft of my new 12-chapter campaign for 5<sup>th</sup> Edition.

data.title: Micrathene
data.description: Super Simple PWA for building [Microlite20](https://micro.bloodbuilder.online/docs/Microlite20.pdf) characters.

data.title: Waterdeep, A Curated Guide
data.description: I’m the Game Master for a <abbr title="Dungeons & Dragons">D&D</abbr> campaign of Waterdeep: Dragon Heist. This is a chronicle of my players’ time spent in Waterdeep.

data.title: BloodBuilder
data.description: Super Simple PWA for [1e Pathfinder](https://paizo.com/pathfinder) Pure Core Classes.

data.title: GIFs on GIFs on GIFs
data.description: A curated list of sick GIFs.

data.title: Feelin’ Dizzy
data.description: Feelin’ dizzy or blue? This should sort you right out.
